project_descr: Strengthening Management Effectiveness and Generating Multiple Environmental Benefits within and around Protected Areas in Zambia

outputs.output_title: Small grants to NGOs for NRM
outputs.output_descr: Small grants to NGOS/CBOs for enhancement of community capacities in the environmental protection and natural resources management in areas surrounding the Kafue and West Lunga National Parks

donor_name: FLANDERS INTERNATIONAL COOPERATION AGNECY, FLEMISH GOVERNMENT
outputs.output_descr: This is a multi focal project focusing on biodiversity, land degradation and climate change, with the objective of improving management effectiveness and financial sustainability of core areas of Protected Areas system; sustainable forest management and reducing pressure on natural resources from competing land uses in the buffer zone Game Management Areas (GMAs); and increasing energy efficiency to reduce deforestation and carbon emissions in the GMAs.

project_title: pims4625generating multi env benefits in protected areas
